snippet.title: Neon Ghost Official Trailer | Spatial.io
snippet.description:
Play Now: https://www.spatial.io/s/Neon-Ghost-65e2209a07789d42d8a8c56c?share=3616707370823690856

Dive into Neon Ghost and experience an action-packed adventure MMORPG that takes place in a dystopian world, where you play as a cyberpunk mercenary in a high-stakes battle for survival.

Neon Ghost is a free to play, open-world with an engrossing story and a diverse cast of characters that is entirely playable on the web. Destroy an onslaught of rampaging robots, elevate your skills as you level up, amass an arsenal of powerful weapons and abilities, and become a legend in Neon Ghost.

Are you going to thrive or fall in this chaotic world? Your destiny in Neon awaits.

______________________________________________________________________________

Unleash your creativity with Spatial! Explore worlds, create characters, play games and connect with millions across the globe from web, mobile, and VR.

Learn More: https://Spatial.io
Build with the Unity SDK: https://Docs.Spatial.io
Twitter: https://Twitter.com/@Spatial_io
Instagram: https://Instagram.com/Spatial_io
Discord: https://Discord.gg/Spatial
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/spatial.io
Support: https://Support.Spatial.io
